PREVIEW_DIALOG.TITLE: Preview
PREVIEW_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: This is a preview of the cards you will print. You can save this image to your device by right clicking on it and selecting "Save image as...".
NAVBAR.TITLE: (Yet Another) PF2E Magic Items Cards Generator
NAVBAR.BY: by GimpFather - Part of Gimp's Closet
HERO.TITLE: Quick. Easy. Free.
HERO.SUBTITLE: Generate your own printer friendly magic items cards for Pathfinder 2E.
APP.TITLE: Read before using.
APP.DESCRIPTION.1: This is a simple tool that lets you turn your magic items into cards special card frames. All cards will be arranged on an A4 template as a single image. You‚Äôll be able to check if everything is positioned correctly, then save the file and print it for use in your games.
APP.DESCRIPTION.2: App allows you to enter any text you want in fields such as bulk, usage, etc., be sure to double-check that everything looks right before printing.
APP.DESCRIPTION.3: The reasoning behind that is an idea to make the app as flexible as possible so you can adapt it to your own needs. You never know when someone might need to put ‚Äúreally heavy‚Äù as the bulk value.
APP.DESCRIPTION.4: This app is desktop only and usage browser's local storage.
MAKE_ITEMS.TITLE: Create items by entering the data below.
MAKE_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION: An A4 sheet will usually fit around 6 to 9 items, but this isn‚Äôt a strict rule, so use the preview to check whether everything fits. The only required field is the name; all other fields are optional to give you full flexibility. You can add or remove items whenever you like.
MAKE_ITEMS.DESCRIPTION.LOCAL_STORAGE: All items are saved in your browser‚Äôs local storage (after clicking the save button), so you can return to them later and continue working on them.
